item.title: Tips for Patients With Pulmonary Disease Before Air Travel
item.description: There are tests and discussions to be had before these patients take flight. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Azoospermia May Signal Hidden Health Risks
item.description: Azoospermia affects one in 100 men and is linked to a higher risk for cancer, cardiovascular disease, and metabolic disorders. Medscape Medical News
